Blog.post: haiz..., 2dae kana beaten by e stupid Miss D. Tan! U SUZ!! wa kao mi hand now blue-black liao! haiz..., wad happen 2 mi beautiful hand???!!! hahaz..., jk jk... 2dae..., oso go watch 'The Village' with mi 2 bez frenz: Pam n AnniE!, mi KoR..., Chinkai n Yu SOng!! wa lao!! didnt expect Yu Song's hp 2 b the hp dat i've always dreamed off!! haiz.., itz ok..., God shall bless mi den.... o yea... oso went to watch movie wif mi fren... Han Hui... haiz..., i didnt tok 2 him..., i tought i very the brav3!! well, who noez..., didnt reali tok to him at all.... feel so guilty sia... haiz... hope i can make it up 2 him... wellz..., haiz..., mi frenz burden bcum mi burden nowadaes..., haiz... DAMN JEALOUS N ENVY SIA!!! MI BEZ FRENZ ALL GT BF!! I DUN HAVE!!! BOO HOO HOO!!! haiz... now i oso dunno hw to improve on dis... mayb i shouldnt have even started dis ting... hahaz!!!

first of all..., needa sae happy bdae to mi country 1st... hahaz..., i noe lah.., im lame...!! aniwaes..., damn tired sia..., juz now went to mi fren'z hse practice sum stupid dance..., my leg damn pain sia..., haiz..., itz ok i shall ren!! aniwaes..., i was dancing n my fren'z (aiya practically her name is Pamela).., stead (which they juz got 2gether 2dae!!) hahaz..., i'll nv 4get dis dae..., sing's bdae n their 1st dae of relationship..., aniwaes..., like i was saeing..., Pam's stead (Chinkai)..., brought this guy along... all i noe is his nick is 'Shi Fu' hahaz...! he alone was watchin mi n Pam dance the stupid song..., n den Pam said he gave mi dat eye-sight like he wanted 2 woo mi n stuff... n i went like 'shut up!'..., i had enough of LOVE!! it totally sux man! nwaes..., i felt so weird the whole time there..., whenever the guy was around... HACK!! CANT B BOTHERED!! 2dae..., oso suppose 2 meet a guy name 'Dean' frm Frenster..., den last min change..., cuz Pam couldnt go..., n without her gg, i'll b the only gurl..., which i wld feel DAMN WEIRD!! especially when im nt really really REALLY close 2 dem.., den i juz gt 2 noe dem on Friday... hahaz..., 2dae i oso finally accomplished my task..., 2 dance 10 times the song that we're suppose 2 dance 4 skool's talentquest..., but wa lao ..., damn shag after dat man!! i was so tired... but always kana disturb by mi frenz n kor... wanna tk wad foto...? hahaz... aiya..., 2dae.., i shall write until here... cuz damn shag... shld i try nt 2 sleep the whole nite..., i shall try..., if im reallyyyy damn damn DAMN SHAG le..., den wo jiu fang qi... go slp baz... nitez... peace out!

ok..., I jUz Gt dIS cRap sTaRted!! but still i dont feel happy at all though i've always wanted 2 get dis thin started due 2 the lack of time... haiz.. suppose to go church yesterdae 2 play guitar 4 the service but i didnt... i juz didnt have the mood too... SORRY GOD!! i dunnoe y... after e fight between every1 in mi cell..., dere's juz a gap between everyone else... we used to b so damn bloody close... but nw, we've all drifted apart... nw im wonderin if i shld transfer cell or nt..., no 1 told dat Nicole transferred cell!! n dey (not all though) even blamed mi 4 dat!! dey said i was too loud... Nicole was very nice 2 mi...!! todae..., was suppose to go church 4 trainin... but i skipped... i didnt wanted to face them...though mi bez fren (StEpHaNiE!!!) ish back frm her NDP thingy..., SORRY STEF!! haiz..., my sista n my kor gg 2 watch sum concert 2dae.., wif so many ppl..., my sista asked mi 2 go but i didnt... y? bcuz i hate to go out wif too many ppl... aiya... i gt no mood liao le... continue 2morrow... byez...
